Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=edit me}},
We’ve extended the survey deadline to this Friday (1/16) because we don’t want to miss your input!
As a reminder, here's what we're measuring:
We're working to improve our estimated ship date and notifications process for repair and overhaul customers. Our team is already in place to begin making changes, so don't miss this chance to direct our efforts. Your voice matters!
To complete the survey, simply click on the link below, or copy the entire web address into the address bar of your web browser. Please make sure you copy the whole link.
URL: {{lead.Survey Link:default=edit me}}
If you have any questions, please email Lori Goodman at LGoodman@lynxresearch.net <http://goaero.honeywell.com/n0Q50HH02QZq0XI0S300Gp9>
Thank you in advance for completing our survey.
Sincerely,
The Honeywell Customer Experience Team
